title: Mafia Miss Fortune's hair clips with her hat [GAMEPLAY]
body: Mafia Miss Fortune is one of my favorite skins for Miss Fortune. I would like it if this was fixed. ;_;

replies.body:
Hey Vyln,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here.
Did I mention the cuffs too o;
The cuffs aren't something we'll be fixing since it's something that isn't visible from game height/speed. The hat issue is something we'll tackle, though.

It's been 3 years and the hat on the Mafia Miss Fortune skin was never fixed. It's one of my favorite skins this game has to offer and it looks like it was completely half-assed. Please tell whoever to get this fixed.
Ew, that looks really bad. Please fix it, @Riot.
